pr_title: config doc generator  top level grouping refactor

timeline.message:
refactor(config-doc-generator): top level grouping refactor

Follow up https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/8155 and most precisely this comment https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/8155#discussion_r398112922

timeline.bodyText: When would rootName be different than parentName?
timeline.author: geoand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -67,12 +69,13 @@ ScannedConfigDocsItemHolder findInMemoryConfigurationItems() {
      * Recursively find config item found in a config root given as {@link Element}
      *
      * @param element - root element
-     * @param parentName - root name
+     * @param rootName - root name
+     * @param parentName - parent name
      * @param configPhase - configuration phase see {@link ConfigPhase}
      * @param withinAMap - indicates if a a key is within a map or is a map configuration key
      * @param sectionLevel - section sectionLevel
      */
-    private List<ConfigDocItem> recursivelyFindConfigItems(Element element, String parentName,
+    private List<ConfigDocItem> recursivelyFindConfigItems(Element element, String rootName, String parentName,

replies.bodyText:
When scanning group configs items -see  https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/8183/files#diff-5b3aaa451926ba3ee4ee4207f00433f1R289
So taking the liveness-probe config group for example, we'll have kubernetes as root name,  and kubernetes.liveness-probe as parent name.
replies.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText: That's to say, the rootName does not change with depth while the parentName changes.
replies.author: machi1990
